creator: o_sukhodolsky@yahoo.com
text:
Re.match() has optimization for regexps with prefix.
I think it's worth to add optimization for regexps which starts with BOL(^)

creator: o_sukhodolsky@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 10866
Suggested fix (it optimizes matching for non multiline matching only)

creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
text: Modified & applied. I added loop to handle BOL & MATCH_MULTILINE case.
